job_details.Functieomschrijving: ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships., Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.
job_details.full_text:
MLOps cloud solution engineer

ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships., Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on MLOps and cloud solutions engineering within an analytics unit, but lacks specific details about core AI/ML model development or generative AI tasks. It emphasizes implementation and collaboration rather than the creation or adaptation of predictive or generative models, aligning more with a traditional engineering or operations role that utilizes AI/ML outputs rather than developing them. Therefore, it does not fit the specific criteria for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job title explicitly mentions 'MLOps cloud solution engineer' and the description discusses 'implementing these solutions across the organization', indicating a focus on operationalizing and deploying solutions.

The role is within 'ING Analytics' and aims to 'realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond', indicating a need to understand business context and strategic goals.
job_tasks.phrase: realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions' and 'implement these solutions across the organization', which implies software development and integration aspects.
The role involves working with 'global and local Retail Contact Center teams', suggesting interaction with business stakeholders to understand their needs.
job_tasks.phrase: work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams

soft_skills.phrase: work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders
